name: Signals - Messages From The Source (Bi$DVRK)
description:
A derivative of bisdvrk's OBJKT#404305 (Messages From The Source) - Proceeds split 50/50 - which extracted audio and converted into a visualization through an oscilloscope emulator which shows an exact representation of the sound (Left/Right audio channels trigger Horizontal/Vertical deflection of a Cathode Ray Tube) to juxtapose the digitization of the human experience and consider the abstraction of data into art.

The center void from Messages from the Source was filled in with this visualization and the hue and intensity was edited in the emulator to derive a similar moment of pause for reflection - something I admire in his art and wanted to depict with this piece.
